game.name: Flow Of War
game.shortDescription: A classic RTS with automated micromanagement. Workers perform their tasks and your army fights automatically. Free up your hands to focus on building a strategic defense for your base and craft an army and mighty heroes to destroy enemies on endless procedurally generated maps.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A classic RTS with automated micromanagement. Workers perform their tasks and your army fights automatically. Free up your hands to focus on building a strategic defense for your base and craft an army and mighty heroes to destroy enemies on endless procedurally generated maps.
